Articles.Content:
I'm using Connected Living Space, since I kind of like the added challenge in spacecraft design.

 

However, I've noticed that I have no passable adapters between the stock radial sizes, except the stock 1.25m to 2.5m adapter. I want more options. Any suggestions? Other mods? Start modding myself?

Look for the README.TXT installed in the GameData\ConnectedLivingSpace\Configs directory. It explains how to enable a lot of stock parts that aren't recognized by default.  Anything not in those files you have to patch yourself.
